thought: I am currently trying to craft a brown_bed. The first step is to craft acacia_planks which can be done by placing stripped_acacia_log in the crafting grid. There is a stripped_acacia_log in slot 12. Therefore, I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: brown_bed
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 16}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 35, "index": 24}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 33}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 37, "index": 38}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]

thought: I have now crafted the acacia_planks. These need to be moved to an empty inventory slot so that I can continue to craft the brown_bed. Therefore, I will move them from the craft slot (0) to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
